sentence.Network_en: We believed our love was inviolate.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们相信我们的爱情坚如磐石。

sentence.Network_en: The constitution proclaims that public property shall be inviolate.
sentence.Network_cn: 宪法宣告公共财产不可侵犯.

sentence.Network_en: They considered themselves inviolate from attack.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们认为自己是不可侵犯的.

...inviolable(不可攻击的，不可侵犯的)impugn（攻击，反对）inviolate（纯洁的，无污点的）impurefigurativeliteral(sure) 比喻引申的字面上的.
enfeeble←→invigorateinviolate a. 未亵渎的,未受侵犯的,无污点的not violated or profaned; especially URE

list.abs: It is an inviolable mission of the entire Chinese people to reunify the motherland ., 实现祖国统一是全体中国人民的神圣使命.
Taiwan is an inalienable part of the inviolable territory of China .台湾是中国神圣领土不可分割的一部分。
it is the inviolable duty of all Chinese people , including our compatriots in Taiwan , to accomplish the great task of reunifying the motherland .完成统一祖国的大业是包括台湾同胞在内的全中国人民的神圣职责。
...人的身体的伤害，“人身”（Personal insurance）就是针对人的生命和身体伤害保的险，“人身不可侵犯”（Personal inviolability）是对不得伤害他人身体之告诫。（注：就所有这些包含Personal的词素的术语的英文形式以及汉译，参见.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Latin inviolatus, from in- 'not' + violare 'violate'

entry.tran: 不受侵害的;未受损害的;不受影响的
entry.def: If something is inviolate, it has not been or cannot be harmed or affected by anything.

example.ex: We believed our love was inviolate.
example.tran: 我们相信我们的爱情坚如磐石。

example.ex: ...their retreat into an inviolate private domain.
example.tran: 他们退回到一个不受侵害的秘密领地

means.word_mean: 1. (of a woman) having the hymen unbroken;
